sentences.en: Accompanys year digital publication theall the way in the digital age away is not unproductive.
sentences.cn: 伴随一年数字出版的脚步,《数字时代周刊》一路快跑,未敢懈怠.

sentences.en: And it was said that unproductive women can get pregnant, after washing in the grotto.
sentences.cn: 据传达室久未怀孕的妇女沐浴洞中,亦可孕育生命, 洋溢活力.
摩羯座:商务旅行看上去并没什么收获.

sentences.en: For some small unproductive mills, the reality is not merger but obsolescence and bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 对一些效率低下的小厂而言, 现实不是合并,而是可能被淘汰和破产.

sentences.en: I've had a very unproductive day.
sentences.cn: 我这一天什么事都没干成。
自我 惩罚是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Labour has accordingly been distinguished into Productive and Unproductive.
sentences.cn: 劳动因此而被分成生产性的和非生产性的.

sentences.en: One - fourth of the country is reckoned as unproductive.
One quarter of the country is reckoned as unproductive.
sentences.cn: 该国四分之一的土地被认为是不毛之地.

sentences.en: Owing to the rise of the temperature, the land becomes barren and unproductive.
sentences.cn: 由于气温升高, 土地变得贫瘠而减产.

sentences.en: Politicians love uncorrected GDP since it adds up both productive and unproductive costs, magically damagepositive indicator.
sentences.cn: 政客们喜欢未调整的GDP,因为它把有产出和没产出的成本都算上了, 从而神奇的变废为宝.

sentences.en: Shifting gears when relationships are unproductive.
sentences.cn: 改变无效关系的变通方式.

sentences.en: The talks between labor and management were unproductive.
sentences.cn: 工人与管理层之间的对话毫无效果.

sentences.en: There is unproductive consumption by productive consumers.
sentences.cn: 生产性消费者也有非生产性的消费.

sentences.en: To prospect for ( oil, for example ) in an area supposed to be unproductive.
sentences.cn: 盲目开掘在认为资源不足的地区盲目找 ( 如油 )

words.tran_cn: 非生产性的；徒劳的；不毛的；不生产的

trans.tran_cn: 不毛的，没有产物的，没有收益的，非生产性的，徒然的，没有效果的
